sentence.text: In DLBCL patients, overexpression of phosphatidylcholine biosynthetic process was in parallel with an increase in tumor negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, as well as a decrease in serum choline metabolite phosphatidylcholine levels and an International Prognostic Index, indicating intermediate-high or high risk.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
